content.prompt: What do lines 38-48 (“Therefore we . . . sensibilities”) reveal about the author’s view?

choices.label: Use of the pronoun “we” indicates her agreement with widespread concerns.
The question “who knows?” signals bitter annoyance rising in her voice.
Repetition of the word “particular” emphasizes her uncompromising outlook.
The opposition between “very” and “mere” exemplifies her ambivalent perspective.

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
